SQLAlchemy ORM¶

Here, the Object Relational Mapper is introduced and fully described. If you want to work with higher-level SQL which is constructed automatically for you, as well as automated persistence of Python objects, proceed first to the tutorial.

  • 객체 관계형 튜토리얼(Object Relational Tutorial)
    • 버전 확인(Version Check)
    • 연결(Connecting)
    • 매핑 선언(Declare a Mapping)
    • 스키마 생성(Create a Schema)
    • 매핑된 클래스의 인스턴스 생성
    • 세션 생성(Creating a Session)
    • 객체의 추가 및 갱신(Adding and Updating Objects)
    • 롤백 하기(Rolling Back)
    • 쿼리하기(Querying)
    • 릴레이션 만들기(Building a Relationship)
    • 관계형 객체로 작업하기(Working with Related Objects)
    • Join으로 쿼리쓰기(Querying with Joins)
    • Eager 로딩(Eager Loading)
    • 삭제하기(Deleting)
    • Building a Many To Many Relationship
    • 더 읽어보기
